===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – [[spawn]], [[egg]].

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-row||egg, nit}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྲོ་མ||egg of a louse, nit, small bubble}}.

{{och-l|鯤}} may represent a doublet resulting from prefix preemption. Compare its variant {{zh-l|𡖉}}.

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|たまご|yomi=k}}
<div class="thumb tright">
<div class="thumbinner" style="width: 252px;">[[File:Vogeleier.jpg|124px]] [[File:Fried_egg,_sunny_side_up.jpg|123px]] <div class="thumbcaption">{{lang|ja|卵}}</div></div></div>
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たまご|玉|tr1=tama|t1=ball|子|tr2=ko|t2=child, small thing}}. The final ''ko'' voices to ''go'' due to {{rendaku|たまご}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|たまご|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|玉子}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たまご}}

# an [[egg]]
#: This term in Japanese is nearly as broad in use as {{cog|en|egg}}, indicating an egg as [[lay|laid]] by various [[oviparous]] [[organism]]s, and egg as used in [[cooking]]. For the more specific biological sense of {{m|en|ovum}}, see {{l|ja|卵子|tr=''ranshi''}}.

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|らん|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=らん}} {{m|zh|卵|tr=lwan<sup>X</sup>}}.
